pkgmetadata.longdescription:
XPaint is an X Window System color image bitmap editing program. It also supports advanced features, such as image processing algorithms, scripting and batch jobs. XPaint allows the edition of multiple images simultaneously and supports a wide variety of image formats, including: GIF, JPG, PNG, PPM, TIFF, XBM, XPM, etc.
xpaint is now fully UTF8 compliant, and is capable of using antialiased truetype fonts in its operations and in the menus (in particular, translating to oriental languages should now be quite easy - also the X core font protocol is no longer used anywhere.)
xpaint also offers optional editing features based on programmable filters and user defined procedures written as scripts in plain C. The package includes a substantial list of examples and some support for batch processing.
